meanings.definition: To replace or repair panels on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The workers are repaneling the damaged wall.
meanings.sent2: She hired a contractor to repanel the old ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The repaneling of the fence turned into a community project.
meanings.sent4: The artist repaneling the mural with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: After repaneling the door, it looked brand new.

meanings.definition: The act of adding new panels to a structure.
meanings.sent1: The repaneling of the house gave it a modern look.
meanings.sent2: The repaneling of the stage was necessary for the performance.
meanings.sent3: The repaneling of the treehouse made it more spacious.
meanings.sent4: The repaneling of the boat made it more stable on the water.
meanings.sent5: The repaneling of the car added extra storage space.
